div.h1: File:Flag of the Democratic Republic of the Congo (1997–2003).svg

div.div: From Wikimedia Commons, the free media repository

img.alt: File:Flag of the Democratic Republic of the Congo (1997–2003).svg

div.div: Size of this PNG preview of this SVG file: 800 × 533 pixels. Other resolutions: 320 × 213 pixels | 640 × 427 pixels | 1,024 × 683 pixels | 1,280 × 853 pixels | 2,560 × 1,707 pixels | 900 × 600 pixels.

div.p: Original file ‎(SVG file, nominally 900 × 600 pixels, file size: 1 KB)

div.label: English
div.div: Add a one-line explanation of what this file represents

tr.td: DescriptionFlag of the Democratic Republic of the Congo (1997–2003).svg
The Flag of Congo Kinshasa from 1997 to 2003.
Own work. Construction sheet: Flags of the World - Democratic Republic of Congo - Flag Details.
See File history below for details.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

tr.td:
This work was first published in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and is now in the public domain because its copyright protection has expired by virtue of the Ordinance-Law No. 86-033 of 5 April 1986 on the Protection of Copyright and Neighboring Rights (details). The work meets one of the following criteria:
It is an anonymous, pseudonymous or posthumous work and 50 years have passed since the date of its publication
It is a photographic work, and 25 years have passed since the date of its publication
It is another kind of work, and 50 years have passed since the year of death of the author (or last-surviving author)
It is an "official act of authority" and ineligible for copyright protection; however "literary, artistic, or scientific publications produced by the authorities" are copyrighted by the government

img.alt: Flag of the Democratic Republic of the Congo.svg

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr; border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

td.i: This work is ineligible for copyright and therefore in the public domain because it consists entirely of information that is common property and contains no original authorship.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa;

tr.td: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.
iThe source code of this SVG is valid.

td.span: This vector image was created with a text editor.

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 17:22, 2 November 2019

tr.td: Slight dimension correction for "great" star, according to construction sheet ("Flags of the World", see: [https://www.crwflags.com/fotw/flags/cd_const.html#prem]). Increased nominal dimensions. Optimized svg code with code cleanup and reduction. No other changes.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 09:48, 7 May 2019
Thumbnail for version as of 15:54, 18 April 2011

tr.td: I changed the blue to Pantone 286 C(hex: 005DAA).

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 12:20, 18 February 2006

tr.td: upload from previous content of Image:Flag of the Democratic Republic of the Congo.svg

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 18:43, 28 September 2005

tr.td: Flag of the Congo Kinshasa 1997 to 2003 Category:Flags of the Democratic Republic of the Congo

div.p: View more global usage of this file.

This file contains additional information such as Exif metadata which may have been added by the digital camera, scanner, or software program used to create or digitize it. If the file has been modified from its original state, some details such as the timestamp may not fully reflect those of the original file. The timestamp is only as accurate as the clock in the camera, and it may be completely wrong.
